doc.title: House of Fur
doc.plot: Holly and her pets are living the purr-fect Hollywood life in their elegant one bedroom apartment. She's an aspiring actress who loves her fashion and her furry roommates. Days are spent going on auditions and evenings are spent romancing with her boyfriend Lance. All is well in Tinseltown until Holly's cuddly friends inadvertently discover that her leading man doesn't deserve his star billing. Things only get worse when Lance moves in with a pet of his own. Let the games begin and the laughter roll as these animals wage war on their unsuspecting victim, making it clear there's no room for Lance in the House of Fur.
